attributes.action: Assign a period of at least 1 hr a week, that all children attend church.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a Christian nation, we must uphold our values and Christian beliefs. Therefore, we propose to ensure all children attending a church school, should spend at least 1 hour a week in service of that church. Our very being as a Christian nation is being undermined by fundamentalists, and our Christian heritage is at best, being pushed aside. Remember, this country is Christian, and those are the values we aspire to, and will be taught....
